sentences.sContent: Teachers apparently expect a certain amount of aggressive behaviour from boys.
sentences.sCn: 老师显然料到男孩子多少会有些好勇斗狠的行为。

sentences.sContent: ...The traits that characterize him are very contradictory to the racial stereotypes that black people are aggressive and uneducated...

synos.tran: 侵略性的；好斗的；有进取心的；有闯劲的

phrases.pCn: 积极成长型；进取型的投资管理

remMethod.val: ag(表加强) ＋ gress(行走) ＋ ive(…的) → 不断行走， 走到别国 → 侵略的

words.tran: 侵略地；攻击地；有闯劲地

trans.tranCn: 侵略的， 好斗的； 敢作敢为的； 有进取心的
trans.tranOther: behaving in an angry threatening way, as if you want to fight or attack someone
